property_sql_factory_datasets.sql:
SELECT
    <%=sourceSystem%> || '::'|| "RSEG"."MANDT" || '::'|| "RSEG"."BELNR" 
        || '::'|| "RSEG"."GJAHR" ||'::'|| "RSEG"."BUZEI"                            AS "ID",
    <%=sourceSystem%> || '::' || "RSEG"."MANDT" || '::'|| "RSEG"."BELNR"
        || '::'|| "RSEG"."GJAHR"                                                    AS "VendorInvoice",
    <%=sourceSystem%> || '::' || "RSEG"."MANDT" || '::'|| "RSEG"."LFBNR" 
        || '::'|| "RSEG"."LFGJA" || '::'|| "RSEG"."LFPOS"                           AS "GoodsReceipt",
    <%=sourceSystem%> || '::' || "RSEG"."MANDT" || '::'|| "RSEG"."EBELN" 
        || '::'|| "RSEG"."EBELP"                                                    AS "PurchaseDocumentLine",
    "RSEG"."SGTXT"                                                                  AS "Description",
	"RSEG"."WRBTR" *
    CASE
       WHEN "RSEG"."SHKZG" = 'H' THEN -1.0
       WHEN "RSEG"."SHKZG" = 'S' THEN 1.0 
     END                                                                            AS "Amount",
	"RSEG"."MEINS"                                                                  AS "QuantityUnit",
	"RSEG"."MENGE" *
    CASE
        WHEN "RSEG"."SHKZG" = 'H' THEN -1.0
        WHEN "RSEG"."SHKZG" = 'S' THEN 1.0 
     END                                                                            AS "Quantity",
	CAST("RSEG"."BUZEI" AS VARCHAR(255))                                            AS "LineNumber",
    <%=sourceSystem%> || '::' || "RSEG"."MANDT"                                     AS "SourceSystemInstance"
FROM "RSEG" AS "RSEG"
    JOIN "RBKP" AS "RBKP" 
        ON "RSEG"."MANDT" = "RBKP"."MANDT"
            AND "RSEG"."BELNR" = "RBKP"."BELNR"
            AND "RSEG"."GJAHR" = "RBKP"."GJAHR"
WHERE NULLIF("RSEG"."MANDT", '') IS NOT NULL
    AND "RBKP"."VGART" IN ('RD','RS')

SELECT
    <%=sourceSystem%> || '::'|| "RSEG"."MANDT" || '::'|| "RSEG"."BELNR" 
        || '::'|| "RSEG"."GJAHR" ||'::'|| "RSEG"."BUZEI"                            AS "ID",
    <%=sourceSystem%> || '::' || "RSEG"."MANDT" || '::'|| "RSEG"."BELNR"
        || '::'|| "RSEG"."GJAHR"                                                    AS "VendorInvoice",
    <%=sourceSystem%> || '::' || "RSEG"."MANDT" || '::'|| "RSEG"."LFBNR" 
        || '::'|| "RSEG"."LFGJA" || '::'|| "RSEG"."LFPOS"                           AS "GoodsReceipt",
    <%=sourceSystem%> || '::' || "RSEG"."MANDT" || '::'|| "RSEG"."EBELN" 
        || '::'|| "RSEG"."EBELP"                                                    AS "PurchaseDocumentLine",
    "RSEG"."SGTXT"                                                                  AS "Description",
	"RSEG"."WRBTR" *
    CASE
       WHEN "RSEG"."SHKZG" = 'H' THEN -1.0
       WHEN "RSEG"."SHKZG" = 'S' THEN 1.0 
     END                                                                            AS "Amount",
	"RSEG"."MEINS"                                                                  AS "QuantityUnit",
	"RSEG"."MENGE" *
    CASE
        WHEN "RSEG"."SHKZG" = 'H' THEN -1.0
        WHEN "RSEG"."SHKZG" = 'S' THEN 1.0 
     END                                                                            AS "Quantity",
	CAST("RSEG"."BUZEI" AS VARCHAR(255))                                            AS "LineNumber",
    <%=sourceSystem%> || '::' || "RSEG"."MANDT"                                     AS "SourceSystemInstance"
FROM "RSEG" AS "RSEG"
    JOIN "RBKP" AS "RBKP" 
        ON "RSEG"."MANDT" = "RBKP"."MANDT"
            AND "RSEG"."BELNR" = "RBKP"."BELNR"
            AND "RSEG"."GJAHR" = "RBKP"."GJAHR"
WHERE NULLIF("RSEG"."MANDT", '') IS NOT NULL
    AND "RBKP"."VGART" IN ('RD','RS')
